snippet: Stocks on Wall Street were mixed on Friday, despite a positive showing by the United States labor market for December.
abstract: Stocks on Wall Street are mixed, despite a positive showing by the United States labor market for December.
lead_paragraph: Stocks on Wall Street were mixed on Friday, despite a positive showing by the United States labor market for December.

headline.main: Market Response Tepid To U.S. Labor Report
headline.print_headline: Market Response Tepid To U.S. Labor Report
